thread.title: KATHLEEN

author: KATHLEEN
title: KATHLEEN
text: I purchased the Bella Brushed Oak and Painted Display Cabinet in cream. It is a very nice piece and I have received a lot of complements on it. It is a quality, solid piece. I was not sure what to expect ordering online, but the end product is beautiful, well made and solid. I called and spoke to a Customer Service Rep before ordering and he was very friendly and helpful. It was delivered to the spot I wanted it. Unwrapping it took a bit as it was very well wrapped for shipping. It comes fully assembled other than adding the knobs to open the doors. I am very happy with this purchase!
